\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: <g1>Light probes</g1> capture the lighting at the position you place them.
<g1> sondas de luz </g1> capturam a iluminação na posição que os colocam.
<g1>Light probes</g1> capture the lighting at the position you place them.
They simulate <g2>indirect light</g2>, the effect of light bouncing off surfaces and illuminating other surfaces.
Eles simulam <g2>indirect light</g2>, o efeito da luz saltando de superfícies e iluminando outras superfícies.
They simulate <g2>indirect light</g2>, the effect of light bouncing off surfaces and illuminating other surfaces.
They can make a dramatic difference to the mood and appearance of your scene.
Eles podem fazer uma diferença dramática ao humor e aparência de sua cena.
They can make a dramatic difference to the mood and appearance of your scene.
The screenshot below shows a <g1>point light</g1> surrounded by light probes in the Scene Editor.
A captura de tela abaixo mostra uma luz <g1>point</g1> rodeada por sondas de luz no Editor de cena.
The screenshot below shows a <g1>point light</g1> surrounded by light probes in the Scene Editor.
The probes form 3D areas (shown in the Scene Editor by the yellow wireframe connecting the probes).
As sondas formam áreas 3D (mostradas no Editor de Cena pelo wireframe amarelo conectando as sondas).
The probes form 3D areas (shown in the Scene Editor by the yellow wireframe connecting the probes).
Stride colors pixels within a light probe area to simulate the effect of light bouncing from nearby surfaces.
Passe pixels de cores dentro de uma área de sonda de luz para simular o efeito de luz saltando de superfícies próximas.
Stride colors pixels within a light probe area to simulate the effect of light bouncing from nearby surfaces.
To find a color for a given pixel, Stride interpolates from the lighting captured by the four surrounding light probes.
Para encontrar uma cor para um determinado pixel, Stride interpola da iluminação capturada pelas quatro sondas de luz circundantes.
To find a color for a given pixel, Stride interpolates from the lighting captured by the four surrounding light probes.
For example, in the screenshot below, notice how the red of the wall is reflected on the other objects.
Por exemplo, na captura de tela abaixo, observe como o vermelho da parede se reflete nos outros objetos.
For example, in the screenshot below, notice how the red of the wall is reflected on the other objects.
In the Scene Editor, this is also visible on the surface of the light probes themselves.
No Editor de Cena, isso também é visível na superfície das sondas de luz.
In the Scene Editor, this is also visible on the surface of the light probes themselves.
Light probes affect all objects in the area they cover, including static and dynamic objects.
Sondas de luz afetam todos os objetos na área que cobrem, incluindo objetos estáticos e dinâmicos.
Light probes affect all objects in the area they cover, including static and dynamic objects.
You don't need to enable any extra options on the entities that light probes affect.
Você não precisa ativar nenhuma opção extra nas entidades que as sondas leves afetam.
You don't need to enable any extra options on the entities that light probes affect.
Enable light probes in the graphics compositor
Ativar sondas de luz no compositor gráfico
Enable light probes in the graphics compositor
Stride enables light probes by default in new projects.
O Stride permite sondas de luz por padrão em novos projetos.
Stride enables light probes by default in new projects.
To make sure light probes are enabled:
Para garantir que as sondas de luz estejam habilitadas:
To make sure light probes are enabled:
In the <g1>Asset View</g1> (in the bottom pane by default), double-click the <g2>Graphics Compositor</g2> asset.
No <g1>Asset View</g1> (no painel inferior por padrão), clique duas vezes no <g2>Graphics Compositor</g2> ativo.
In the <g1>Asset View</g1> (in the bottom pane by default), double-click the <g2>Graphics Compositor</g2> asset.
O editor de compositores gráficos abre.
In the <g1>Property Grid</g1> (on the right by default), make sure the <g2>Light probes</g2> checkbox is selected.
No <g1>Property Grid</g1> (à direita por padrão), certifique-se de que a caixa de seleção <g2>Light é selecionada.
In the <g1>Property Grid</g1> (on the right by default), make sure the <g2>Light probes</g2> checkbox is selected.
For more information about the graphics compositor, see the <g1>Graphics compositor</g1> page.
Para obter mais informações sobre o compositor gráfico, consulte a página <g1>Graphics compositor</g1>.
For more information about the graphics compositor, see the <g1>Graphics compositor</g1> page.
Right-click the scene or Entity Tree and select <g1>Light > Light probe</g1>.
Clique com o botão direito do mouse na cena ou Entity Tree e selecione <g1>Light > Sonda de luz </g1>.
Right-click the scene or Entity Tree and select <g1>Light > Light probe</g1>.
Alternatively, create an empty entity and add a <g1>Light probe component</g1> in the Property Grid.
Alternativamente, crie uma entidade vazia e adicione um componente de sonda <g1>Light</g1> na Grade de Propriedade.
Alternatively, create an empty entity and add a <g1>Light probe component</g1> in the Property Grid.
<x1/> Adicionar componente de sonda de luz<x2/>
Light probes appear as spheres in the Scene Editor.
Sondas de luz aparecem como esferas no Editor de cena.
Light probes appear as spheres in the Scene Editor.
Before you capture a light bounce for the first time, they have a completely black surface.
Antes de capturar um salto de luz pela primeira vez, eles têm uma superfície completamente preta.
Before you capture a light bounce for the first time, they have a completely black surface.
Light probes must be placed in a way that creates a <g1>3D volume</g1>.
Sondas de luz devem ser colocadas de uma forma que cria um volume <g1>3D</g1>.
Light probes must be placed in a way that creates a <g1>3D volume</g1>.
You need <g1>at least four light probes</g1> in the scene — enough to create the four points of a tetrahedron, as below:
Você precisa <g1>pelo menos quatro sondas de luz</g1> na cena — o suficiente para criar os quatro pontos de um tetraedro, como abaixo:
You need <g1>at least four light probes</g1> in the scene — enough to create the four points of a tetrahedron, as below:
At least one light probe must be on a different plane from the rest.
Pelo menos uma sonda leve deve estar num avião diferente do resto.
At least one light probe must be on a different plane from the rest.
For example, the probes in the screenshot below won't work, as they are on a flat plane and create no volume:
Por exemplo, as sondas na captura de tela abaixo não funcionarão, pois estão em um plano plano plano e não criam volume:
For example, the probes in the screenshot below won't work, as they are on a flat plane and create no volume:
A typical method is to place light probes in a grid across your scene covering a general area, as in the screenshots below:
Um método típico é colocar sondas de luz em uma grade em sua cena cobrindo uma área geral, como nas capturas de tela abaixo:
A typical method is to place light probes in a grid across your scene covering a general area, as in the screenshots below:
You can quickly duplicate light probes just like other entities.
Você pode duplicar rapidamente sondas de luz como outras entidades.
You can quickly duplicate light probes just like other entities.
To do this, select a light probe, hold <g1>Ctrl</g1>, and move it with the mouse.
Para fazer isso, selecione uma sonda de luz, segure <g1>Ctrl</g1> e mova-a com o mouse.
To do this, select a light probe, hold <g1>Ctrl</g1>, and move it with the mouse.
In the Scene Editor toolbar, click the <g1>lighting options</g1> button to open the lighting options menu.
Na barra de ferramentas do Editor de cena, clique no botão <g1>lighting options</g1> para abrir o menu de opções de iluminação.
In the Scene Editor toolbar, click the <g1>lighting options</g1> button to open the lighting options menu.
Next to <g1>Bounces</g1>, set the number of light bounces you want to capture.
Ao lado de <g1>Bounces</g1>, defina o número de saltos de luz que você deseja capturar.
Next to <g1>Bounces</g1>, set the number of light bounces you want to capture.
Multiple bounces simulate the effect of light bouncing between surfaces multiple times.
Vários saltos simulam o efeito da luz saltando entre superfícies várias vezes.
Multiple bounces simulate the effect of light bouncing between surfaces multiple times.
This generally has the effect of brightening the lighting.
Isso geralmente tem o efeito de iluminar a iluminação.
This generally has the effect of brightening the lighting.
Three or four bounces should be enough; beyond this, changes are almost unnoticeable.
Três ou quatro saltos devem ser suficientes; além disso, as mudanças são quase inaceitáveis.
Three or four bounces should be enough; beyond this, changes are almost unnoticeable.
The number of bounces has no impact on runtime performance.
O número de saltos não tem impacto no desempenho do tempo de execução.
The number of bounces has no impact on runtime performance.
Para capturar a iluminação, clique em <g1>Compute</g1>.
You can see the lighting on the surface of the light probes in the Scene Editor.
Você pode ver a iluminação na superfície das sondas de luz no Editor de cena.
You can see the lighting on the surface of the light probes in the Scene Editor.
To reset the light probes, in the <g1>lighting options</g1> menu, click <g2>Reset</g2>.
Para redefinir as sondas de luz, no menu <g1>lighting options</g1>, clique em <g2>Reset</g2>.
To reset the light probes, in the <g1>lighting options</g1> menu, click <g2>Reset</g2>.
This is useful after you change the lights in your scene and need to capture the lighting from scratch.
Isso é útil depois de alterar as luzes em sua cena e precisa capturar a iluminação do zero.
This is useful after you change the lights in your scene and need to capture the lighting from scratch.
Show and hide light probes in the Scene Editor
Mostrar e ocultar sondas de luz no Editor de cenas
Show and hide light probes in the Scene Editor
Under the <g1>gizmo options</g1> in the Scene Editor toolbar, use the <g2>Light probes</g2> checkbox.
Sob as opções <g1>gizmo</g1> na barra de ferramentas do Editor de Cena, use a caixa de seleção <g2>Light probes</g2>.
Under the <g1>gizmo options</g1> in the Scene Editor toolbar, use the <g2>Light probes</g2> checkbox.
Show and hide light probe volumes in the Scene Editor
Mostrar e ocultar volumes de sonda de luz no Editor de cenas
Show and hide light probe volumes in the Scene Editor
Under the <g1>gizmo options</g1> in the Scene Editor toolbar, use the <g2>Light probe volumes</g2> checkbox.
Sob as opções <g1>gizmo</g1> na barra de ferramentas do Editor de Cena, use a caixa de seleção <g2>Light probe volumes</g2>.
Under the <g1>gizmo options</g1> in the Scene Editor toolbar, use the <g2>Light probe volumes</g2> checkbox.
<x1/> volumes de sonda de luz Hide<x2/>
<x1/> volumes de sonda de luz em e off<x2/>
